HealthcarePractitionerFacility.name: HealthcarePractitionerFacility
HealthcarePractitionerFacility.description: Represents the different locations in which a practitioner provides services.

AccountId.description: Account associated with this practitioner facility.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this practitioner facility is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this practitioner facility is no longer effective.

GenderRestriction.description: Indicates whether physician sees patients of a specific gender.

HealthcareFacilityId.description: The Healthcare facility associated with this healthcare practitioner facility.

HealthcareProviderId.description: Healthcare provider associated with this healthcare practitioner facility.

HighestValidAge.description: The highest age of patients that the practitioner sees at this facility

InitialStartDate.description: Date the practitioner started at this facility.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the record is active.

IsDirectoryPrint.description: Indicates whether this facility is displayed in an online or printed directory.

IsPrimaryCarePhysician.description: Indicates whether the practitioner provides primary care services at this facility.

IsPrimaryFacility.description: Indicates whether the facility is the primary facility for the practitioner.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LowestValidAge.description: The lowest age of patients that the practitioner sees at this facility.

Name.description: Name of the practitioner facility record.

OperatingHoursId.description: Identifies the operating hours for this practitioner at this facility.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PractitionerId.description: ID of the practitioner associated with this facility.

ServiceTerritoryMember.description: The service territory member associated with the record.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of an external record on its source system.

TerminationDate.description: Date the practitioner stopped working at this facility.

TerminationReasonCode.description: Reason the practitioner facility is no longer current.
